CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Pass_to_New_Loads_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Pass_to_New_Loads_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Number of Days in NB
